Classes/TestInterceptor/WaitingError.htm.name: expectedCountNotReached(message:)
Classes/TestInterceptor/WaitingError.htm.abstract: The TestInterceptor didn’t receive the expected number of Actions.

Classes/TestInterceptor.html#/s:17Fluxor.abstract: Waits for the expected number of Actions to be intercepted.

Structs/EffectRunner.html#/s:17FluxorTes.name: run(_:with:environment:expectedCount:)
Structs/EffectRunner.html#/s:17FluxorTes.abstract: Run the Effect with the specified Action and return the published Actions.

Structs/EffectRunner.html#/s:17FluxorTes.name: run(_:with:expectedCount:)
Structs/EffectRunner.html#/s:17FluxorTes.abstract: Run the Effect with the specified Action and return the published Actions.

Classes/MockStore.html#/s:17FluxorTestSu.name: stateChanges
Classes/MockStore.html#/s:17FluxorTestSu.abstract: All the Actions and state changes that has happened.

Classes/MockStore.html.name: MockStore
Classes/MockStore.html.abstract: A MockStore is intended to be used in unit tests where you want to observe

Structs/EffectRunner.html.name: EffectRunner
Structs/EffectRunner.html.abstract: The EffectRunner can be used to run Effects with a specified Action.

Classes/TestInterceptor.html.name: TestInterceptor
Classes/TestInterceptor.html.abstract: An Interceptor to use in unit tests, to assert specific Actions are dispatched.

Structs/StoreValue.html#/s:6Fluxor10Stor.name: projectedValue
Structs/StoreValue.html#/s:6Fluxor10Stor.abstract: A Publisher for the selecterd value in the Store

Structs/StoreValue.html#/s:6Fluxor10Stor.name: init(_:_:)
Structs/StoreValue.html#/s:6Fluxor10Stor.abstract: Initializes the StoreValue property wrapper with a Store and a Selector.

Structs/StoreValue.html.name: StoreValue
Structs/StoreValue.html.abstract: A property wrapper for observing a value in the Store.

Classes/PrintInterceptor.html#/s:6Fluxor.name: actionDispatched(action:oldState:newState:)
Classes/PrintInterceptor.html#/s:6Fluxor.abstract: The function called when an Action is dispatched on a Store.

Protocols/Interceptor.html#/s:6Fluxor11I.name: actionDispatched(action:oldState:newState:)
Protocols/Interceptor.html#/s:6Fluxor11I.abstract: The function called when an Action is dispatched on a Store.

Protocols/Interceptor.html.name: Interceptor
Protocols/Interceptor.html.abstract: A type which intercepts all Actions and the State changes happening in a Store.

Classes/PrintInterceptor.html.name: PrintInterceptor
Classes/PrintInterceptor.html.abstract: A Interceptor to use when debugging. Every Actions and State change are printed to the console.

Extensions/Publisher.html#/s:7Combine9Pu.name: ofType(_:)
Extensions/Publisher.html#/s:7Combine9Pu.abstract: Only lets Actions of a certain type get through the stream.

Extensions/Publisher.html#/s:7Combine9Pu.name: wasCreated(from:)
Extensions/Publisher.html#/s:7Combine9Pu.abstract: Only lets Actions created from the given ActionTemplates get through the stream.

Extensions/Publisher.html#/s:7Combine9Pu.name: withIdentifier(_:)
Extensions/Publisher.html#/s:7Combine9Pu.abstract: Only lets AnonymousActions with a certain identifier get through the stream.

Extensions/Publisher.html.name: Publisher
Extensions/Publisher.html.abstract: Operators for narrowing down Actions in Publisher streams.

Enums/Effect.html#/s:6Fluxor6EffectO14no.name: nonDispatching(_:)
Enums/Effect.html#/s:6Fluxor6EffectO14no.abstract: An Effect that handles the action but doesn’t publish a new Action.

Protocols/Effects.html#/s:6Fluxor7Effect.name: Environment
Protocols/Effects.html#/s:6Fluxor7Effect.abstract: The environment set up in the Store passed to every Effect.

Protocols/Effects.html#/s:6Fluxor7Effect.name: enabledEffects
Protocols/Effects.html#/s:6Fluxor7Effect.abstract: The Effects to register on the Store. The default implementation takes all the Effects in the type,

Protocols/Effects.html#/s:6Fluxor7Effect.name: id
Protocols/Effects.html#/s:6Fluxor7Effect.abstract: The identifier for the Effects. The default implementation is just the name of the type.

Enums/Effect.html.name: Effect
Enums/Effect.html.abstract: A side effect that happens as a response to a dispatched Action.

Classes/Selector5.html#/s:6Fluxor9Select.name: projector

Classes/Selector2.html#/s:6Fluxor9Select.abstract: A pure function which takes the Values from the other Selectors and returns a new Value.

Classes/Selector1.html#/s:6Fluxor9Select.abstract: A pure function which takes the Value from the other Selector and returns a new Value.

Classes/Selector1.html#/s:6Fluxor9Select.abstract: Creates a Selector from a Selector and a projector function.

Classes/Selector.html#/s:6Fluxor8Selecto.name: id
Classes/Selector.html#/s:6Fluxor8Selecto.abstract: An unique identifier used when overriding the Selector on the MockStore.

Classes/Selector.html#/s:6Fluxor8Selecto.name: with(_:projector:)
Classes/Selector.html#/s:6Fluxor8Selecto.abstract: Creates a Selector from a Selector and a projector function.

Classes/Selector.html#/s:6Fluxor8Selecto.name: with(_:_:projector:)

Classes/Selector.html#/s:6Fluxor8Selecto.name: with(_:_:_:projector:)
Classes/Selector.html#/s:6Fluxor8Selecto.abstract: Creates a Selector from three Selectors and a projector function.

Classes/Selector.html#/s:6Fluxor8Selecto.name: with(_:_:_:_:projector:)
Classes/Selector.html#/s:6Fluxor8Selecto.abstract: Creates a Selector from four Selectors and a projector function.

Classes/Selector.html#/s:6Fluxor8Selecto.name: with(_:_:_:_:_:projector:)
Classes/Selector.html#/s:6Fluxor8Selecto.abstract: Creates a Selector from five Selectors and a projector function.

Protocols/SelectorProtocol.html#/s:6Flux.name: map(_:)
Protocols/SelectorProtocol.html#/s:6Flux.abstract: A pure function which takes a State and returns a Value from it.

Protocols/SelectorProtocol.html.name: SelectorProtocol
Protocols/SelectorProtocol.html.abstract: Something which selects a Value from the specified State.

Classes/Selector.html.name: Selector
Classes/Selector.html.abstract: A type which takes a State and returns a Value from it.

Classes/Selector1.html.name: Selector1
Classes/Selector1.html.abstract: A Selector created from a Selectors and a projector function.

Classes/Selector2.html.name: Selector2
Classes/Selector2.html.abstract: A Selector created from two Selectors and a projector function.

Classes/Selector3.html.name: Selector3
Classes/Selector3.html.abstract: A Selector created from three Selectors and a projector function.

Classes/Selector4.html.name: Selector4
Classes/Selector4.html.abstract: A Selector created from four Selectors and a projector function.

Classes/Selector5.html.name: Selector5
Classes/Selector5.html.abstract: A Selector created from five Selectors and a projector function.

Structs/ReduceOn.html#/s:6Fluxor8ReduceO.name: reduce
Structs/ReduceOn.html#/s:6Fluxor8ReduceO.abstract: A pure function which takes the a State and an Action and returns a new State.

Structs/ReduceOn.html#/s:6Fluxor8ReduceO.name: init(_:reduce:)
Structs/ReduceOn.html#/s:6Fluxor8ReduceO.abstract: Creates a ReduceOn which only runs reduce with actions of the type specificed in actionType.

Structs/ReduceOn.html#/s:6Fluxor8ReduceO.name: init(_:reduce:)
Structs/ReduceOn.html#/s:6Fluxor8ReduceO.abstract: Creates a ReduceOn which only runs reduce with actions created from the specificed ActionTemplates.

Structs/Reducer.html#/s:6Fluxor7ReducerV.name: id
Structs/Reducer.html#/s:6Fluxor7ReducerV.abstract: An unique identifier used when registering/unregistering the Reducer on the Store.

Structs/Reducer.html#/s:6Fluxor7ReducerV.name: reduce
Structs/Reducer.html#/s:6Fluxor7ReducerV.abstract: A pure function which takes the a State and an Action and returns a new State.

Structs/Reducer.html.name: Reducer
Structs/Reducer.html.abstract: A type which takes a State and Action returns a new State.

Structs/ReduceOn.html.name: ReduceOn
Structs/ReduceOn.html.abstract: A part of a Reducer which only gets triggered on certain Actions or ActionTemplates.

Protocols/EncodableAction.html#/s:6Fluxo.name: encode(with:)
Protocols/EncodableAction.html#/s:6Fluxo.abstract: To enable encoding of the Action this helper function is needed.

Structs/AnonymousAction.html#/s:6Fluxor1.name: wasCreated(from:)
Structs/AnonymousAction.html#/s:6Fluxor1.abstract: Check if the AnonymousAction was created from a given ActionTemplate.

Structs/ActionTemplate.html#/s:6Fluxor14.name: createAction(payload:)
Structs/ActionTemplate.html#/s:6Fluxor14.abstract: Creates an AnonymousAction with the ActionTemplates id and the given payload.

Structs/ActionTemplate.html#/s:6Fluxor14.name: callAsFunction(payload:)
Structs/ActionTemplate.html#/s:6Fluxor14.abstract: Creates an AnonymousAction with the ActionTemplates id and the given payload.

Classes/Store.html#/s:6Fluxor5StoreC5sta.name: state
Classes/Store.html#/s:6Fluxor5StoreC5sta.abstract: The state of the Store. It can only be modified by the registered Reducers when Actions are dispatched.

Classes/Store.html#/s:6Fluxor5StoreC11en.name: environment
Classes/Store.html#/s:6Fluxor5StoreC11en.abstract: The environment passed to the Effects. The Environment can contain services and other dependencies.

Classes/Store.html#/s:6Fluxor5StoreC12in.name: init(initialState:environment:reducers:)
Classes/Store.html#/s:6Fluxor5StoreC12in.abstract: Initializes the Store with an initial State, an Environment and eventually Reducers.

Classes/Store.html#/s:6Fluxor5StoreC8dis.name: dispatch(action:)
Classes/Store.html#/s:6Fluxor5StoreC8dis.abstract: Dispatches an Action and creates a new State by running the current State and the Action

Classes/Store.html#/s:6Fluxor5StoreC8reg.name: register(reducer:)
Classes/Store.html#/s:6Fluxor5StoreC8reg.abstract: Registers the given Reducer. The Reducer will be run for all subsequent actions.

Classes/Store.html#/s:6Fluxor5StoreC8reg.name: register(reducer:for:)
Classes/Store.html#/s:6Fluxor5StoreC8reg.abstract: Registers the given Reducer for a slice of the State. The Reducer will be run for all subsequent actions.

Classes/Store.html#/s:6Fluxor5StoreC10un.name: unregister(reducer:)
Classes/Store.html#/s:6Fluxor5StoreC10un.abstract: Unregisters the given Reducer. The Reducer will no longer be run when Actions are dispatched.

Classes/Store.html#/s:6Fluxor5StoreC8reg.name: register(effects:)
Classes/Store.html#/s:6Fluxor5StoreC8reg.abstract: Registers the given Effects. The Effects will receive all subsequent actions.

Classes/Store.html#/s:6Fluxor5StoreC8reg.name: register(effects:id:)
Classes/Store.html#/s:6Fluxor5StoreC8reg.abstract: Registers the given Effects. The Effects will receive all subsequent actions.

Classes/Store.html#/s:6Fluxor5StoreC8reg.name: register(effect:id:)
Classes/Store.html#/s:6Fluxor5StoreC8reg.abstract: Registers the given Effect. The Effect will receive all subsequent actions.

Classes/Store.html#/s:6Fluxor5StoreC17un.name: unregisterEffects(ofType:)
Classes/Store.html#/s:6Fluxor5StoreC17un.abstract: Unregisters the given Effects. The Effects will no longer receive any actions.

Classes/Store.html#/s:6Fluxor5StoreC17un.name: unregisterEffects(withId:)
Classes/Store.html#/s:6Fluxor5StoreC17un.abstract: Unregisters the Effects registered with the id, so they will no longer receive any actions.

Classes/Store.html#/s:6Fluxor5StoreC8reg.name: register(interceptor:)
Classes/Store.html#/s:6Fluxor5StoreC8reg.abstract: Registers the given Interceptor. The Interceptor will receive all subsequent Actions and state changes.

Classes/Store.html#/s:6Fluxor5StoreC22un.name: unregisterInterceptors(ofType:)
Classes/Store.html#/s:6Fluxor5StoreC22un.abstract: Unregisters all registered Interceptors of the given type.

Classes/Store.html#/s:6Fluxor5StoreC13se.name: selectCurrent(_:)
Classes/Store.html#/s:6Fluxor5StoreC13se.abstract: Gets the current value in the State for a Selector.

Classes/Store.html#/s:6Fluxor5StoreC7bin.name: binding(get:enable:disable:)
Classes/Store.html#/s:6Fluxor5StoreC7bin.abstract: Creates a Binding from the given Selector and ActionTemplates for enabling and disabling the value.

Classes/Store.html#/s:6Fluxor5StoreC7bin.name: binding(get:send:)
Classes/Store.html#/s:6Fluxor5StoreC7bin.abstract: Creates a Binding from the given Selector and closure.

Classes/Store.html#/s:6Fluxor5StoreCAAyt.name: init(initialState:reducers:)
Classes/Store.html#/s:6Fluxor5StoreCAAyt.abstract: Initializes the Store with an initial State and eventually Reducers.

Classes/Store.html.name: Store
Classes/Store.html.abstract: The Store is a centralized container for a single-source-of-truth State.
